servinfo.title: Irregular and/or Premature Wear Description
servinfo.ptxt: Irregular and premature wear has many causes. Some of them are as follows: incorrect inflation pressures, lack of tire rotation, driving habits, improper alignment.
If the following conditions are noted, rotation is necessary:

item.ptxt: Front tire wear is different from rear.
Uneven wear exists across the tread of any tire.
Both side of front tire wears are not even.
Both side of rear tire wears are not even.
There is cupping, flat spotting, etc.

servinfo.ptxt: A wheel alignment check is necessary if following conditions are noted:

item.ptxt: Both side of front tire wears are not even.
Wear is uneven across the tread of any front tire.
Front tire treads have scuffed appearance with “feather” edges on one side of tread ribs or blocks.

entry.ptxt: Hard Cornering, under inflation or lack of tire rotation
Incorrect wheel alignment, tire construction not uniform or wheel heavy acceleration
